mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT B.ifeed) as feedCnt, COUNT(c.ifeed) as favCnt , A.nm, A.created_at as createdAt, A.pic , D.follower, D.following, D.followState FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_feed B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav C ON B.ifeed = C.ifeed JOIN (SELECT SUM(IF(from_iuser = #{targetIuser}, 1, 0)) AS following , SUM(IF(to_iuser = #{targetIuser}, 1, 0)) AS follower , ( SUM(if(from_iuser = #{loginedIuser} AND to_iuser =#{targetIuser},1,0)) + SUM(if(from_iuser = #{targetIuser} AND to_iuser =#{loginedIuser},2,0)) ) AS followState FROM t_user_follow ) D WHERE A.iuser = #{targetIuser}
